text: Moorefield is an unincorporated community in Pleasant Township, Switzerland County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== Moorefield was platted in 1834. A post office was established at Moorefield in 1838, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1916. ==Geography== Moorefield is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Switzerland County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Moorefield, Indiana
